definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.chinese: 股份公司制使得大型企业成为可能。

sentences.english: Chapter Five designs a new incentive scheme for Luo Xin Pharmaceutical Company Limited.
sentences.chinese: 第五章对罗欣股份公司员工激励进行了设计。

sentences.english: The stockholders of large corporationsare scattered around the globe.
sentences.chinese: 大型股份公司的股东分布在全球各地。

sentences.english: Investment companies shall be regarded as overseas promoters of limited-liability companies.
sentences.chinese: 投资性公司应视为股份公司境外发起人。

sentences.english: For many legal purposes, the corporation is considered as a resident of itsstate.
sentences.chinese: 出于很多法律目的，股份公司被认为是国家的居民。

sentences.english: Due to strained capital . the company is seeking cooperation partner and operated by joint-stock company .
sentences.chinese: 由于资金紧张，寻找合作伙伴，按股份公司运作。

sentences.english: Major corporations may have hundredsof thousands of shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 大型股份公司可能会有成千上万的股东。

sentences.english: A science and technology company in Baotou was founded in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 包头某科技股份公司成立于2003年。

sentences.english: The SPC Huhang Railway Jinwei Branch in the south of the Industrial Zone is employed for the Industrial Zone railway transportation.
sentences.chinese: 依托工业区南侧的石化股份公司沪杭铁路金卫支线。

sentences.english: The supervision mechanism of share-holding companies consists of both internal and external supervision.
sentences.chinese: 股份公司的监督机制是一个内外结合的监督体系。

sentences.english: There are also some disadvantages toorganizing as a corporation.
sentences.chinese: 对于经营股份公司来说，也有一些不利的因素。

sentences.english: Private-equity firms rely heavily on a few stars.
sentences.chinese: 私有股份公司通常特别依赖若干明星。

sentences.english: Batelco established in 1981 as a Bahraini Shareholding Company.
sentences.chinese: 巴林1981年成立股份公司作为巴林。

sentences.english: So we need toexplain what a corporation is.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们需要解释什么是股份公司。

sentences.english: In 1989, Grammer Corporation became a holding company.
sentences.chinese: 在1989年格拉默股份公司成为一家控股公司。

pinyin: gu3 fen4 you3 xian4 gong1 si1

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
wholly foreign-owned enterprise (WFOE) (form of legal entity in China)/abbr. to 外資企業|外资企业[wai4 zi1 qi3 ye4]
pinyin: wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4
